directions: Combine sauce ingredients in a bowl. Place clams in a steamproof dish. Stir sauce, pour over clams. Place dish on a rack in a wok over 6 cups boiling water, cover and steam, 1 1/2 to 2 minutes. Do not oversteam, or clams will become tough. Turn off heat and remove dish from steamer. Garnish with coriander and serve immediately.
ingredients: 1 1/2 teaspoons Chinese white rice vinegar or distilled white vinegar
12 clams, medium, opened on the half-shell by a fishmonger
title: Clams Steamed with Ginger and Scallions
